title: AllGraphicDesign.com
content:
Hello everyone. I own a popular graphic design resource site. I recently introduced a forum/message board section and I need to get it started with some posts. Can some of you post a message or 2 to get it started out. The site is [www.allgraphicdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013110929/http:/www.allgraphicdesign.com/) and the forum is located at [http://www.allgraphicdesign.com/phorum/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013110929/http:/www.allgraphicdesign.com/phorum/index.php) . Thanks everyone for your help.   
   
Rachel
author: deezin
